{
    "error": "conflict",
    "message": "(psycopg2.errors.UniqueViolation) duplicate key value violates unique constraint "hitmen_email_key"
DETAIL:  Key (email)=(julian@gmail.com) already exists.

[SQL: INSERT INTO hitmen (hitman_uuid, name, lastname_1, lastname_2, email, password, status, rank, manager_uuid) VALUES (%(hitman_uuid)s, %(name)s, %(lastname_1)s, %(lastname_2)s, %(email)s, %(password)s, %(status)s, %(rank)s, %(manager_uuid)s)]

(Background on this error at: https://sqlalche.me/e/14/gkpj)"
}
